decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 12 (sustainable drainage system) of planning permission 17/14450/FUL. The applicant has not demonstrated the provision of the proposed revised infiltration-based drainage scheme and the current variation proposal will not allow for the review of a revised scheme, therefore, the proposal fails to prevent the increased risk of flooding, in accordance with policy SI.13 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012
description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Conditions 2 (Approved plans), 3 (Facing materials), 7 (Landscaping scheme), 12 (sustainable drainage system) and 18 (boundary tratement) for Application Reference Number: 17/14450/FUL (Demolition of existing house and erection of 6 bedroom, two storey house and semi-basement with associated alterations to access, parking and landscaping) dated 04/07/2017. Variation to consist of changes to design and layout, landscaping, drainage scheme, boundary fences, and asssociated changes to condition wording
